maml:description.maml:para: Creates a new web hosting plan in a given Geo location.
Creates a new web hosting plan in a given Geo location with the specified SKU, worker size and number of workers.

Sku of the Webhosting plan to be created.
Number of workers to allocate.
Size of the workers.

Number of workers to allocate.
Size of the workers.
Name of the resource group.
Name of the web hosting plan.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Creates a new web hosting plan in resource group "Default-Web-WestUS" -with web hosting plan name "NgoliWHP" in geo location "West US" using Basic sku and allocates total 2 workers worker size is Small
